job_history.work_description: Responds to inbound telephone inquiries from members, benefit recipients, and others regarding all OPERS benefits and services. Provides benefit information necessary for members to make informed life-path decisions regarding benefit selection, account changes, etc.

Pinpointed fraud trends specific to online money movement and communicated information to colleagues within department. Researched monetary transactions made at Chase.com, ensuring validity of transactions and security of customer accounts.

Answer high volume incoming calls from internal Chase colleagues and account holders who require assistance with deposit holds, New Account Screening, Fraud Activity, Account Restrictions, AML Closures, Kiting and AAU Closures.
Enforced relief to the customers by reviewing the situation, ensuring consumer satisfaction throughout the de-escalation process. Investigate and solve customers' long-standing or complex problems.
Remained up to date for developments and changes in products, services, policies and procedures by reading job aid guides, attending briefing/meetings and completing courses.
Develop and prepare packets containing information about social service agencies, assistance organizations, and programs that might be useful for inmates or offenders.
Monitor checkout stations to ensure that they have adequate cash available and that they are staffed appropriately.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in customer-facing roles, handling high-volume incoming calls, and resolving complex customer issues, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Risk Analysis
skills.explanation: Experience in identifying and communicating fraud trends, researching monetary transactions, and ensuring security of customer accounts, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Consistently demonstrated ability to investigate and solve customers' complex problems, showing strong proficiency in problem-solving.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effective communication skills demonstrated through various roles, including providing benefit information, explaining complex issues to customers, and collaborating with colleagues.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed high-volume incoming calls, ensured adequate cash availability, and staffed checkout stations appropriately, showing solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Adaptability
skills.explanation: Demonstrated adaptability by staying up-to-date with developments and changes in products, services, policies, and procedures, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Some experience with researching monetary transactions and identifying fraud trends, but limited depth in data analysis.
